code: import React from'react';import CourseListRow from'./CourseListRow';import{StyleSheet,css}from'aphrodite';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CourseListRowHead=[{cellOne:'Available courses',cellTwo:null,isHeader:true},{cellOne:'Course name',cellTwo:'Credit',isHeader:true}];const CourseList=_ref=>{let{listCourses}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:css(styles.CourseList),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:CourseListRowHead.map((course,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CourseListRow,{textFirstCell:course.cellOne,textSecondCell:course.cellTwo,isHeader:course.isHeader},idx))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:listCourses!==null&&listCourses!==void 0&&listCourses.length?listCourses.map(_ref2=>{let{id,name,credit}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CourseListRow,{textFirstCell:name,textSecondCell:credit},id);}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CourseListRow,{textFirstCell:"No course available yet"})})]});};const styles=StyleSheet.create({CourseList:{border:'1px solid #f3eaea',width:'100%',borderCollapse:'collapse',marginTop:'0.6rem'}});export default CourseList;
